author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Midsona AB Q4 ‍Net Sales Amounted To Sek 579 Million (521)​
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Midsona Ab:
* Q4 ‍NET SALES AMOUNTED TO SEK 579 MILLION (521).​ * Q4 ‍PROFIT FOR PERIOD WAS SEK 34 MILLION (16)​ * ‍FOR 2017, A DIVIDEND OF SEK 1.25 PER SHARE (1.10) IS PROPOSED​
* ‍MIDSONA EXPECTS SALES AND EBITDA TO INCREASE IN 2018.​ * ‍“MAIN FOCUS FOR 2018 WILL BE OPTIMISING OUR NORDIC PLATFORM, CREATING BEST GROWTH CONDITIONS FOR OUR BRANDS.”​
* ‍“MIDSONA DOES NOT EXCLUDE ADDITIONAL ACQUISITIONS IN NORDIC REGION, BUT WILL FOCUS PRIMARILY ON OTHER PARTS OF WESTERN EUROPE.”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
